QD-slogan:
Jump, collect coins
and reach the flag!
FS-slogan: Control a spaceship, shoot and make the highest score!
quest1: Why my game is considered as a virus?
quest2: What tools did you use for design your games?
quest5: Are your games made by AI?
answer1:
If your game is detected as malware by Windows, it is likely a false positive.
A false positive refers to software incorrectly identified as malicious by antivirus programs.
This occurs because our games are not digitally signed with a certificate recognized by Windows, which can trigger security alerts.
answer4: The best way to help us is to play at our games, share yours feedbacks and talk all around!
answer5: The assets in our games (graphics, sounds, visuals) are created manually or use royalty-free resources. However, AI can be used as an aid, particularly for programming.
dev-tools: • Game engine: Godot Engine, GB Studio
level-tools: • Level design tools: Tiled, Figma, paper pencil
desc1:
KevFR8 Studio is a showcase studio specializing in game development.
The objective is to create games that are entertaining and captivating.
